meanings.definition: A person who gives official permission or approval.
meanings.sent1: The authorizer signed the document to give permission for the project.
meanings.sent2: The authorizer at the office approved the new budget proposal.
meanings.sent3: The authorizer was so busy signing papers that they accidentally approved a request for a pizza party.
meanings.sent4: She was the authorizer of all decisions in the company, holding the power to grant or deny requests.
meanings.sent5: The authorizer's stamp of approval was like a golden ticket, granting access to the exclusive event.
